keyPolicies.policyTitle: A chance to keep EU laws that protect our environment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocating for the retention of EU environmental protection laws.
Supporting electoral reform towards a more representative voting system.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Genuinely affordable homes and living rents
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promoting the development of affordable housing and the establishment of living rents.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS run for patients not profits
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Emphasizing the need for a National Health Service that prioritizes patient care over profitability.

issues.environment: Advocating for the retention of EU environmental protection laws.

issues.health: Emphasizing the need for a National Health Service that prioritizes patient care over profitability.
